text: Arau smarana karaa, yetiya mucha'i nija sampradayaka kaichila, ‘he mora sampradaya! Tomaloke tomalokara prati allahara anugraha smarana karaa yetiya te'om tomalokara majara paraa'i nabi bana'ichila arau tomalokaka raja-badasbaha bana'ichila arau srstijagatara kako yito dana karaa nachila se'ito tomalokaka pradana karaichila’
